trans-unit.source: Creates the theme-specific look for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> elements.
The actual appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system.
The properties of this class allow [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] to set the appearance based on the current theme.

In XAML usage, a ButtonChrome object element can also have child content, which can be a single <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property.
## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace.
Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome"></xref> class.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush used to draw the outer border of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
The brush used to draw the outer border of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome.BorderBrush*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the brush used to draw the color inside the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>.
This property is not available in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] theme.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
The brush.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome.Fill*> dependency property.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> has the appearance of the default button on the form.
The default button generally has a darker outer border or other visual indicator that shows the user which button will be clicked if the Enter key is pressed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`| (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> has the appearance of the default button; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome.RenderDefaulted*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> appears as if the mouse is over it.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`| (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> appears as if the mouse is over it; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome.RenderMouseOver*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> appears pressed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`| (however, this property might not be set in all themes)|

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref> appears pressed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.ButtonChrome.RenderPressed*> dependency property.
To be added.
